sqlMap.statement: SELECT PBCKEY, PBC_DES FROM T07_PBCRULE_N where flag='1' ORDER BY INTERFACEKEY DESC,PBCKEY
SELECT RULEKEY, RULE_DES, PBCKEY FROM T07_SYSRULE where flag='1' order by RULEKEY

WITH T AS (SELECT A.RULEKEY, A.PBCKEY, C.INDICKEY, C.INDICNAME FROM T07_SYSRULE A, T07_RULE_INDIC_R B, V07_INDIC C WHERE A.RULEKEY = B.RULEKEY AND B.INDICKEY = C.INDICKEY), S AS (SELECT D.VALPARAKEY, D.PARA_DES, D.UPPER_LIMIT, D.LOW_LIMIT, E.INDICKEY FROM T07_VALPARA D, T07_INDIC_VALPARA E WHERE E.VALPARAKEY = D.VALPARAKEY) SELECT T.*, S.VALPARAKEY, S.PARA_DES, S.UPPER_LIMIT, S.LOW_LIMIT FROM T LEFT JOIN S ON T.INDICKEY = S.INDICKEY
SELECT t.templatekey FROM T08_DEF_TMPL t WHERE t.temptype = #temptype# AND t.templatekey IN ('2542','2582') ORDER BY t.templatekey
SELECT T.TEMPLATEKEY, T.CATEGORYKEY, T.DES AS CATEGORY_DES, T.OCC AS CATEGORY_OCC FROM T08_DEF_CAT T WHERE T.TEMPLATEKEY IN ('2542', '2582') ORDER BY TEMPLATEKEY,CATEGORYKEY
SELECT A.CATEGORYKEY, A.BASICKEY, C.CHECKUPPOINT, A.BASICOCC AS BASIC_OCC, A.BASE_SCORE FROM T08_DEF_CAT_BIA A, T08_DEF_BASIC C WHERE A.BASICKEY = C.BASICKEY

select DISTINCT a.GSKEY ,a.LEVELKEY,a.REMARK,a.PARTY_TYPE,a.GRANULARITY ,b.templatekey, c.valparakey as t_valparakey,c.para_des as t_para_des,c.upper_limit as t_upper_limit,c.low_limit as t_low_limit from T08_GS_BASE a,T08_DEF_GS b ,T08_VALPARA c ,T08_GS_INDIC d,T08_INDIC_VALPARA e,T08_DEF_TMPL f where a.gskey=b.gskey and b.gskey=d.gskey and d.indickey=e.indickey and e.valparakey=c.valparakey and b.templatekey=f.templatekey order by a.GRANULARITY asc
